articles.author: Kate Brady
articles.title: Dresden jewel heist gang convicted and sentenced to years in prison - The Washington Post
articles.description: It was one of Europe’s most daring jewel heists when members of the Remmo clan broke into the Green Vault museum at Dresden’s Royal Palace in a smash-and-grab job.
articles.content:

articles.title: Zelenskyy blitzes Europe with fighter jet diplomacy - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Ukrainian president pushes for ‘coalition of jets’ ahead of G7 summit in Japan.
articles.content: LONDON  Ukraine has no permanent seat at the G7 leaders summit. But Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has already made sure his talking points will dominate discussions at the G7s annual get-to… [+4764 chars]
